actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management Act of 1982 to provide for the appointment by the President of a director of the Minerals Management Service, and for other purposes.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Amends the Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management Act of 1982 to establish the position of Director of the Minerals Management Service, who shall be appointed by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate. Requires the Director to perform any duties the Secretary of the Interior may prescribe with respect to managing public resources under the Secretary's jurisdiction. Establishes the position of Deputy Director of the Minerals Management Service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management Act of 1982 to provide for the appointment by the President of a director of the Minerals Management Service, and for other purposes.
